games.Desc: SURF the urban wave! DODGE the oncoming trains!
games.subtitle: SYBO Games

games.Desc:
DASH as fast as you can! DODGE the oncoming trains! Help Jake, Tricky & Fresh escape from the grumpy Inspector and his dog. 
★ Grind trains with your cool crew! 
★ Colorful and vivid HD graphics! 
★ Hoverboard Surfing! 
★ Paint powered jetpack! 
★ Lightning fast swipe acrobatics! 
★ Challenge and help your friends! Join the most daring chase! A Universal App with HD optimized graphics. By Kiloo and Sybo.
